name: Sassafras's Root Beer Bar
description:
Sassafras has just returned to her hometown from the big city. Her parents are getting older so she'd decided to take over her family's business: a root beer bar. Brew drinks and prepare food comprised of root vegetables to satisfy all 23 customers. The quicker they are served, the higher tip you'll receive.

--How to Play--

Left click to move/interact.

Pick up vegetables from the vegetable sack and either bring them to the cutting board to prepare a meal, or create juice from them at a juicing machine.

Bring juice to the carbonation machine to create root beer. You can either serve the root beer to the customer, or store it in a keg to dispense later. Collect money from customers once they leave.

Press escape to pause.

Hint - You'll have 1 minute of prep time before customers begin coming in, so it'd be a good idea to brew some batches of root beer before the bar opens.
